description:
Nataku is an androgynous clone of extreme psychic ability. It was created by Toujou Pharmaceuticals, one of the largest pharmaceutical companies in Japan, from genetic material taken from its president`s late granddaughter, Kazuki, and her father Masaki. It is completely sexless, not possessing genital organs of any sort, and appears to be totally emotionless. It is named for Nataku or Nezha (哪吒), a Chinese deity, who was born fully formed out of a ball of flesh.
A Dragon of Earth, it is haunted by memories of its past life as Kazuki, and follows Fuuma`s orders unquestioningly, as he resembles the person Kazuki cared for the most in life, her father.
name: Nataku
